decoworld.server.database.clans

Class ClanDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.server.database.clans.ClanDAO

  • public class ClanDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements storage of all clans on web database server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Initiates the clan DAO class when called Creates the clans table and sets initialised to TRUE on completion
